TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TrueSizeScalingType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the scaling type of a visual style element with a fixed size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The TrueSizeScalingType values represent the return values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method when it is called with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrueSizeScalingType Dpi = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The element is scaled to dots per inch (DPI) settings.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrueSizeScalingType None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No scaling type is specified for the element.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrueSizeScalingType Size = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The element is scaled to size settings.
